nodes.text: Ilos was a bland agricultural world that was located within the Ilos system of the galaxy's Hutt Space region and lay on the hyperlane called the Pabol Sleheyron, which connected it to the planets of Chalacta and Ilos Minor.
Ilos was the homeworld of the sentient Ilosian species, and millennia before the Battle of Yavin, the Ilosians ventured offworld and colonized hundreds of nearby planets.
Ilos was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the planet in grid square R-10.
